rgi_id.description: Unique identifier assigned to a single intersect line.

rgi_g_id_1.description: Glacier identifier of the intersected glacier number 1. An intersect line is always connecting two glaciers, but the choice of which glacier is listed as 1 is arbitrary.

rgi_g_id_2.description: Glacier identifier of the intersected glacier number 2. An intersect line is always connecting two glaciers, but the choice of which glacier is listed as 2 is arbitrary.

length_m.description: Length of the intersect in meters.
